alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 7:43AM CDT until April 05 at 8:15AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN FRANKLIN AND EAST CENTRAL SEBASTIAN COUNTIES... At 742 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles northwest of Washburn, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported quarter sized hail in Greenwood at 730 am. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Charleston... Greenwood... Branch... Washburn... Fort Chaffee... Milltown... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for west central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
